/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees on both sides, their leaves forming a canopy overhead. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, adding a touch of urban life to the otherwise serene setting. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, providing a beautiful backdrop to the scene. The image is bathed in the warm glow of daylight, highlighting the vibrant colors and casting soft shadows. The overall composition of the image suggests a peaceful day in a bustling city, where nature and urban life coexist harmoniously.
